summary: Adds, at this point, 2 bosses and 2 new spells.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=5]Description[/size][/u]
This mod is a re-upload from the Steam Workshop. It adds a small quest to find a Shardblade, a weapon held by a select few, that is worth a kingdom. To begin your search, look in the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun. (this is for the first Shardblade.)

To find the Honorblade, check out around the front door of Breezehome. 

I will try to update this as often as the Workshop. 



[size=5][u]Updates
[/u][/size]Found those pictures!!! (Sneaky Buggers....)
Edited a few of the items in the mod, and changed a few things with a NPC

[size=5][u]Bugs
[/u][/size]None so far :)


[size=5][u]Other things
[/u][/size]Please tell me any bugs or if you are having any issues with this mod
Images will be uploaded as soon as I can. First I have to find those dasterdly steam screenshots...
author: Dragonlord500 aka Scubachase1999
